choices: Let her go and wait for someone else to come...
Force her to stay and test your power a little more
force her to stay and see the full range of your new power
1.content:
Last thing Frankie could remember was the street for the pub, the rain and than he saw first a blinding light and then darkness.
He looked around and noticed he was in a comfy bed in one of the hospital room, he tried to speak but he couldn't.
Frankie didn't have the strenght to speak yet.

In that moment a nurse get inside the room, a tall girl in her mid twenties with long black hair, she entered the room, checked a few things and the turn around to exit, but Frankie didn't want to, he tried to speak, with all his might, but no one word escaped his lips.
He tought "Please, don't get out" and strangely enough the girl stopped as if she had received an order.

"Thank goodness, she stopped...but...why she's stopped moving at all? could it be..." the he tried again, he focused on the girl and thought "come to me and give me a kiss"

As incredibly as it was, the nurse, with a smile on her face, went near his bed and gave him a kiss, then as nothing was happened she started to exit the room again.

He didn't want to stay alone in the room and he wanted to see if, as it seemed, he had some kind of mind control , but could he really force that girl to stay?
1.title: The awakening

choices: Skip to tomorrow morning and meet Cynthia
Use your powers to find someone else to test your mental power with?
12.content:
"Ok, first thing first" Frankie focused on the nurse again "Turn around and come next to the bed, then you'll stay here until i tell you so"

The girl, which had already reached the door, quickly turned aound and stood silent near his bed as if waiting for something, he took his time looking carefully at the nurse, the name on the ID card was April Mallow, she was a very attractive girl, maybe too skinny for his taste,but Frankie couldn't fail to notice a nice pair of breast hidden under her dress and he started thinking what he could do to try his powers.

"Ok...let's see... I know i can give command to other people, but what else? mmmm...Let's try something more phisical."

"April, from now on you'll start to eat a little more than usual without noticing it, starting right now with the dinner that someone brought in here for me"

The nurse went to the table and looked at the food, she whispered under her breath <Man, it look so tasty but...i've already had dinner and i really shouldn't..>

"Eat that food, it's no problem to indulge once in a while"

April smiled and started eating it and after a little time the plates where licked clean, she moaned a little rubbing her very lightly bloated belly with one hand while the words of Frankie settled down in her subconcious.

"You really liked that and you'll eat double three times per week from now on and.."

A suddenly knock on the door distracted you and April assimilated only the first part of your mental instruction, but it was the minor of your problems right now, because a male voice came from the closed door.
<Miss Mallow? Is everything ok?>

The boy let go the girl with some last instruction to came back in the morning of the following day, then he watched the swaying rear of the nurse get out of the room letting enter a fine man with oval glasses and an open lab coat, his ID card identified him as Dr. John Carpenter.

<Hey boy, how are you feeling now?>

Frank try to speak but he's still without voice.

<Oh don't worry, you're still under shock, you're very lucky you know? Not everyone get caught from a lightning and came out with some light burn mark. Oh Your mother came earlier but you were sleeping so she couldn't came in, but don't worry tomorrow your sister is coming to pick you up>

Frankie couldn't believe his own ears, his sister "Meanie-Bitchy" Cynthia to pick him up?
His face acquired a resemblance of disgust that the doctor noticed.
<You're not so happy about this uh? Sorry but someone have to pick you up, anyway have a good rest boy and don't worry I'm sure you'll manage>

"Oh yes.." frankie thought "After all, with this new power i can give her a lesson".
12.title: Force her to stay and test your power a little ...

choices: Revenge is dish best served cold
Go home on the wheel chair
121.content:
The morning arrived and Frankie wasn't so happy about it, he could sense something very bad around him, then he remembered of his new "powers" and tried to find what was the thing that was leaving such a horrible trail.
He didn't had to search long.

"Cynthia" he thought.

The door to his room opened and the nurse from the last night came in.

<Goodmorning, You're sister is here to pick you up, i have here a wheel chair for you to bring you out ok?>

Frankie answered with a nod and smiled noticing some chocolate on the lips of the nurse, remembering the instructions he gave her the night before.

When he arrived out he could see his sister standing near her car with an annoyed look on her face, frankie then tried using his powers to check her mind:
"There he is finally...god how much more i have to wait...shit i've lost the gym training with Jane...All yours fault asshole..."

<Hey Little one can we go now? or you prefer come home by yourself?>
121.title: Skip to tomorrow morning and meet Cynthia

1211.content:
Frankie was angry.

Of all the people who could came to pick him up...

He looked directly in her eyes concentrating on her mind:

"Now you'll do as i command, from now on you'll be very gentle to your brother, he will be one of the central point of your attention, you'll stop being a bitch about everything and you'll stop going out for shopping everyday."

As soon as the mental control ended Cynthia fell on her knees hugging Frankie as if she hadn't seen him a few minutes ago.
<Frankie? Are you alright? they've treated you well in there?>

The boy smiled mischievously and nodded still unable to speak but thinking of what he could do to her as a token of revenge for all the years passed.
1211.title: Teach her a lesson

12111.content: Ok, now which kind of revenge Frankie will have on her sister?
12111.title: Revenge time!

121111.content:
While Cynthia was driving home Frankie was thinking what he could do to her sister, then all of sudden it came to him.

Her body! She had always been obsessed about being thin, stay in shape and so on...but now things would change.

Frankie focused on her sister:
"Keep driving, from now on you will not go to the Gym, instead you'll go to fast food chains to stuff yourself out, you will not worry for your body, you'll not notice any weight gain until I'll tell you. From now on every time you get out or coming back home, you'll stop to some donut shop for a healthy snack. "

Frankie noticed her lips departed as if she was going to say something but then she stopped returning her smile.

<Hey Frankie...Is a problem if i leave you home now? or do you need to go somewhere else?>

Frankie take a piece of paper from the dashboard scribbling on it that he could go home directly and then asking why.

<I...I just remembered i should go to the Gym...that's all>
121111.title: Weight Gain

choices: An offer from The Mc Donald Manager
1211112.content:
As soon as Cynthia reached home she left Frankie there and drive off again, she felt hungry, not even hungry...ravenous.
She had to eat something, well more than something to satisfy herself, she spotted a McDonald and she drive through it lowering her window to place her order.

<McDonald Good Morning How can we help you?>
<Good morning I would like to order two Cheeseburger menu with fries and apple pie and two McBacon Menu with nuggets and milkshake, please super size all>
<Uhhh...Miss i need to tell you that today there is an offer take four pay two of the same menu, so if you want to change you order you could take two menu free...>
<Oh. Yes then I'll take four Cheeseburger menu with fries and apple pie and four McBacon Menu with nuggets and milkshake, super sized please >
<Miss...your...ehm...order has been placed...uhhh...maybe if you can come inside later on there is some discount you can use...uhh..Miss>
<Ok Thanks>

Right after the payment Cynthia couldn't believe how much food had she bought but, after all, she would go to the Gym later on so it wasn't a problem, she stopped her car in the parking lot and started eating.

Burger after burger passed through her lips, followed by fries and soda, her belly slowly pushing up, her t-shirt rising a little more every time another burger ended up in her stomach, but there she was still feeling hungry.

After a couple of hours she was finished...she was stuffed full and still one Mc Menu was there while the others were scattered around the car in pieces, Cynthia slowly got up and out of the car wanting to go inside the McDonald office to speak of the possible discount.

<Man...how much I ate, I didn't remember McDonald to be so good..>

With a little of her stuffed belly showing between her jeans and her t-shirt she walked inside and then was redirected toward the manager's office.
As soon as she was there a young men, sitting behind the desk, invited her to sit down and then, looking carefully to her bloated belly, he said:

<Good Afternoon Miss, I'm Mr. Anderson, we have been informed of your order of this morning and...>

Cynthia started to blush slightly and tried, futilely, to cover her belly

<Oh Miss, No need to blush, we just wanted to let you know that, for your own convenience, we have a ticket discount you could use if you're interested...>
<What kind of Ticket Discount?>
<Basically Miss, with the Ticket you'll be able to use a Fifty per cent Discount on all of our product 24/7 in any McDonald of this State, plus for every One Hundred Dollar spent for our product you'll be able to have free the double amount of the same items, the cost of this discount is of Two Hundred Dollar on monthly basis, for six months, What do you think of it? >

Cynthia was shocked, it was a good offer(Since her step-father was a rich business man money wouldn't be a problem) but it implied to eat a lot in these places, for some reasons though it didn't seemed too much of a problem after all.

<Well...you know...>
<Yes Miss?>
<Oh what the heck...Where I have to sign?>

The manager grinned, maybe he had found something that the corporation was searching from a long time...
1211112.title: Follow Cynthia's Day

12111122.content:
<So Miss, here is the card for your Discount>

<Thanks Mr. Anderson>

Cynthia started leaving when the Manager called her again:
<Miss, I wanted to ask you something if you have time.>

She turned and seated again replying that she was listening

<Very Well, Miss there is actually a testing that we are doing for a new kind of McDonald Program for our customers, normally we ask only for our more loyal customer but I sensed something about your, let's call it, potential when you came in here >

<What kind of testing?>
<It's called MDM, Mcdonald Daily Menu, it's a home delivered menu that will nourish the customer throughout the day with our fine and healthy food>
<Uhmm sound's interesting but what if I don't want to eat for all the week McDonald and have, for example, some tacos?>
<Well, of course, the Test would have a better result if one stick to our food but, in the end some exceptions can be given.>
Cynthia smiles, <Who would ever know that today could have been such a lucky day for me? Last question, When does it finish? >
<It has been planned to last one month, nourishing you throughout various meals during the day, but there is a remotely chance to be prolonged.
What's your answer Miss?>
12111122.title: An offer from The Mc Donald Manager

choices: Accept the second work (increasing incoming cash and waistline)
Refuse the offer ( Forget about the bakery and proceed )
121111221.content:
"Well, it's a real nice offer, plus I'm sure i can work it off in the gym no sweat...what should I do?"

<Thanks, I accept your offer, it sounds fun!>

<Well Miss, thanks for your effort, I'm sure the beta-testing will have a better chance to it with your help. Now, I'll personally send your data to the management and I think that from next Monday you can start your betatesting. Come to us on Monday morning at 9:00 AM and we will introduce you to the testing and our products. Enjoy the weekend and welcome aboard!>

<Thanks! See you Monday!>

Cynthia walked out of the joint going back to her car, driving toward the city center, she really wanted to go to the gym, as per usual but, strangely enough, as soon as she arrived there she wasn't feeling like going to the gym anymore, bored for the loss of time she thought about walking around in the mall.

She parked her car and started walking through the shops in the mall when suddenly she notice a sign on one of the bakeries:
"Taste tester needed, Good pay, part time, possibility of job from private home."

Cynthia asked herself, why not and stepped inside moving toward the counter,starting asking about the job, finding out that the pay was really good.

<So let me get this straight, everyday, except sunday, I'll have to pass here and get a load of products to taste test and the next day I'll have to give you back the form duly filled? And for that you're gonna pay me 50 $ per day?>

Susanne, or Susy, confirmed with a smile <Yes, as a starter of course, then if you're doing a good job we can see to scrounge up something more. So, what do you think?>

"Well, lemme see, if I have to spend 8 hours taste testing for Mcdonald, then I can come here collecting the goods, eat them at home and start the cycle again...then on sunday I can do excercise so to keep my figure...What should I do?"
121111221.title: Accept (Keep on fattening her up)

choices: Frankie has done something to them
1211112211.content:
<OK, it's a deal!>

<Great! Can you start immediately?>

<Why not? Sure.>

Susy went in the back of the bakery and came back some minutes later with a big box leaving it on the counter.
<Ok then Cynthia, in here there are two dozen donuts, two dozen eclairs and two small chocolate frosted cakes. Come back tomorrow with the filled form and I'll give you the next load ok?>

<Thanks, see you tomorrow!>

Cynthia walked back to her cake putting the treats in the backseat, then she was going to start her car when suddenly her belly grumbled a little bit.

"I better eat something, shall I start the treats or go for a quick snack at the local McDees?...Mmm, better go there, if I start eating sweets at this time I'll ruin up my appetite..Plus I get to use my discount card!"

So Cynthia walked out of her car and went inside the Macdonald coming out of it only two hours later stuffed to the brim, her belly peeking out from under her shirt a little bit more than before.

Slamming the door of her car she started driving home, but before going there she realised that, somehow, she wanted some donuts, so she stopped at a drive thru and bought two dozen of chocolate covered butter and jelly filled donuts eating them right away while driving home.
She didn't realize it, but it was the command from her brother that forced her to do that stop, he couldn't imagine what her sister would have been through before that.

As soon as she reached home, with her bakery work box in arms, she was greeted by her family.
1211112211.title: Accept the second work (increasing incoming cas...

choices: They both would see her, no matter her real weight, as skinny as a rail
12111122111.content: Ok, so let's see what Frankie has done to them...
12111122111.title: Frankie has done something to them

choices: She still has the bakery treats to taste test...
She forgots about the sweets from the bakery
121111221111.content:
Unknown to her, Frankie had done his trick on their parents, making so that from that moment on, they would see Cynthia as an undernourished girl until Frankie wouldn't tell them so.

<Cynthia! How was your day? But look at you!>

The girl, sheepishly tried to hide her belly poking out from under the t-shirt

<Mom, is not as it seems i...>

<Well, Young Lady, it is as it seems, maybe it's even worse. Look at you, so rail thin, I must have been blind to not feed you enough. But from this moment on I swear I'll put some meat on your bones.>

Cynthia looked at her mom with a strange expression before looking in the nearby mirror, she couldn't see anything too strange, except her little bloated belly, but she didn't know she was undernourished.

<You really think so mom?>

<Yes, dear, we have to put some meat on you, otherwise you'll fall away.>

<Well, in that case mom, I've got to tell you that I've taken two jobs today, both as taste tester, one for McDonald and one at the 'Filling out' Bakery near the mall. >

<That's great, dear, but working, even in those healty places, is a tiring activity, you'll have to have a proper nutritional schedule to go on, but for that we will take care of it. now come into the kitchen, we were waiting just for you.>

Cynthia left the bakery box in her room then went into the kitchen, there she saw the table organized all around her seat.

<Mom?>

<Seat dear, you dinner is about to start.>

Cynthia wouldn't have believed if someone had told her that she could eat so much, still she managed to lick clean each plate her mom brought her, for some she had even seconds.

Her meal had been two square of thick and heavy lasagna bolognese, for which she had seconds, an entire fried chicken with fries and onion rings , four sausages with mashed potato drowned in gravy, she had seconds of both, and finally six jelly filled donut, two eclair and two chunks of fudge cake with three scoop of ice cream and whipping cream each.

What she didnt know was that her little brother was messing up with her head, everytime Cynthia's body reached the limit he was there ready to substitute the fullness with hunger.

During the meal her pants couldn't hold anymore and the button popped giving her belly more space to grow, after dinner her mom left her on her bed with the television turned on to rest a little bit, before going to sleep.
121111221111.title: They both would see her, no matter her real wei...

1211112211111.content:
OVerly full from dinner Cynthia literally fell on her bed, the pants she was wearing fell in a heap on the floor since there wasn't anymore the button and she was starting to get asleep when suddenly she remembered about the treats from the bakery. Since she didn't want to fail at her first day of work she eagerly started to consume them, savoring the delectful taste and filling the script as per agreements with Susy.

While munching and gulping them down her belly began, once again, to rise, growing more bloated at each bite, her shirt that had managed to resst so well during the day started to lift up in order to make more room for Cynthia's belly. Finally she managed to swallow the last fo the treat and with a chocolate flavored burp she collapsed again on her bed entering in a deep sleep.

Frankie, had remained near the door looking at her sister gorging, he had developed an hard on for the scene, and was currently steaming it off, while thinking of how big she would be after a full monthof this endless feasts.


The following morning it was a bright day and, Cynthia was eager to start her new day, with only her nightie on she shuffled in her room till she found her slippers than went downstairs for her breakfast, on the table in the kitchen there was already a huge spread of food awaiting for her.

A steaming plate with four omelettes, two mounds of six sausages links both, a plate with 9 waffles drowned in syrup, two tall glass of orange, two of milk and two of hot chocolate.

She almost doubled over just looking at the meal, her mother was lovingly indicating her to get on and start with her breakfast.

<Mom? Are you sure?>

<You're a growing girl Cynthia, you need to be nourished. Now eat up quickly and then you can go.>

Cynthia suddenly didn't need further encouragement, she suddenly felt a ravenous hunger pass through her body and literally attacked the food on the table, devouring each item with greed. One hour later she was patting her bloated belly feeling contently full, so standing up from the table she started moving toward her room when suddenly her mom stopped her.

<Cynthia, I know you just had breakfast, but would you like for some cake? My students made it at school but I grade it already and I don't want to throw it away.>

The girl, even though her belly was still full and bloated took the cake from her mother, starting to nibble on it, squealing in pleasure for the delicious taste then, cake in hand she went back to her room to change in something more comfortable in order to leave the house.

A while later she grabbed the keys of her car and left dressed in a pain of jeans and her favourite t-shirt, between the two her belly, still bloated from breakfast, poked out a bit.
As soon as she was driving she went to the bakery and left the note to Susy, while waiting she bought and nibbled a couple of buttery donuts.

Susi came back from the counter handing over the bill to Cynthia.

<Thank you, the description were precise and showing the plus and the worst, say would you like to earn a little bit of extra today?>
1211112211111.title: She still has the bakery treats to taste test...

121112.content: Let's see how about Shrinkage?
121112.title: Other...

info.brief_description: Frankie has some impossible dreams, all change when he can control mind & body of others..
info.description:
Frankie is a normal guy, about 17 years old, in a normal life except he has some strange tastes in fact of women and some dreams that he cannot realize due to the real life.
One day one event will change his life and all the world rules.
He was going to meet with some friends in a local pub, the weather was terrible, rainy and windy with some thunder enlightening the sky, frankie was running down the road when he got caught from the thunder.

When he was awake he found out that he could control minds, bodies and souls of the people around him.
_____________________________

Ok, now some rules.

The main character is Frankie and he cannot die, all the others (Parents, friends...) yes
Leave always at least two choices in order to not force to follow only one diretcion

-No Yaoi (either love or sex)
-No Male weight gain
- Slob is acceppted but not too much (I'm not a huge fan of it)

Is accepted :
- weight gain (even magical/ fantastical)
-vore
-any other crazy idea (Remember, is still 13+)

Anyway I'll check on a daily basis (Hopefully) and i'll edit or delete any post if is against rules or if is too much short.

Thanks and enjoy :)
